term.title: partition constant

item.text: The ratio of activity of a given species A in the extract to its activity in the other phase with which it is in equilibrium, thus: Its value should not vary with composition but depends on the choice of standard states and on the temperature (and eventually the pressure).

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2373. 'Nomenclature for liquid-liquid distribution (solvent extraction) (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2385 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365112373)
